sourcesContent:
<!-- <ng-container *ngFor="let filter of filter">
  <select [name]="filter.name" [id]="filter.id">
    <ng-container *ngFor="let value of filter.values">
      <option [value]="value">{{value}}</option>
    </ng-container>
  </select>
</ng-container> -->
<select class="select_filter" [(ngModel)]="selectedOption" [name]="filter.name" [id]="filter.name" (change)="capture()">
  <option [value]="filter.name">{{filter.name}}</option>
  <ng-container *ngFor="let value of filter.values">
    <option [value]="value">{{value}}</option>
  </ng-container>
</select>
